author: Austen Hufford
title: Square Expenses Rise As It Courts Larger Business Partners
text:
Square Inc. benefited from more relationships with larger businesses even though it posted another quarterly loss on higher expenses.
The company, which helped popularize processing credit-card transactions through smartphones, said that total payment volume rose 31% to $17.89 billion in its fourth quarter, with larger merchants accounting for a big portion of the growth and representing nearly half of the companyâ€™s total volume.
